case.state: I'm here to win -- for Team Magma!
If you suffer from chills, you should join Team Magma!
I've come all this way for one reason... to win in the name of Team Magma!
Too much water? Join Team Magma, and we'll fix that!
Team Magma appears where anything rare or valuable can be found!

You are challenged by
Team Magma Grunt!
I'm here to win, even if it's four-on-one!
We're Team Magma...
... and we're here to show you ...
... the power of the land over water ...
... and ... wait a minute, what are we doing?
~Human~, did you bring me here as a joke? Do you think so little of me? Am I just here for your amusement? This is borderline insulting.
What are we, some kinda... April fools joke?

The hell kind of internet meme mess did I stumble into?
Nice to meet you May! ... Wait, you seem familiar...
I feel like this girl is way too eager to get started...
... Is that a car? A literal car? ~Human~, did you bring me here as a joke? Do you think so little of me? Am I just here for your amusement? This is insulting.
This is the weirdest feeling, but... I think god left Default-chan unfinished.
Wait, Shelly? Shelly from... Team Aqua?! I won't lose to you!
I d-don't think I signed up to play against t-the living dead!
What am I doing in a place like this? I was invited here! ...or sent here, rather. My name is--
What? Of course I'm meant to be here! My name should be on the list, it's--
This case sets a marker if the player isn't male + gay, or isn't female + straight. Makes it easier than having to do an OR comparison all the time.
Used to set a maker to either be 'Aqua' or 'Magma', because MyMainAccIsANord is lazy and CBA to rewrite all the lines mentioning it.

I'll stick to what I have!
I don't need to swap any!
I'll stick with what I have!

case.state: These cards are good enough for Team Magma!

case.state: Hey guys, Is a Team Aqua grunt dealing me these cards? ... Yeah, that wasn't funny, I know.

state.text: Oh, this is just... can't I get some good cards once in a while?

case.state: Well, this is a terrible start.

Not my best...

Oh no...

Well, magi-crap.
Well, that's just awful.

Magma Grunt thought about using Run, but couldn't due to her pride!
(W-w-wait a minute! That's... the Sinnoh Champion! Oh crap!) Uh, nice weather we're having, right?
Actually... I feel a little out of place here. My leader said I had to do this, but... how does playing strip poker help my team?
Now that I think about it, I feel a little out of place here. This isn't my usual kind of assignment...
Do you guys know what we're doing here? It feels like we're all just here to get naked for ~human~...
I think I'm gettin' the hang of this! Do you guys do this together often?
I think I'm starting to like you guys! Do you hang out like this all the time?
This game ain't so bad now that I'm used to it. Do you all hang out like this often?

state.text: You know Erufuda, you're making me want to grab some fast food after this.

case.state: (Wait a minute, I recognize that girl... she's one of those strong trainers!)

state.text: You can do this... you can do this! You're part of Team Magma! This'll be fine!
Let's see, if I just... no, I can't fight my way out... I didn't even bring my numel with me, so that plan's out...
Maybe if I pretend to be sick? No, I'm bad at that, Courtney saw right through me when I tried to skip trash duty...

case.state: I just thought of something... is this one of those strip poker games where you have to 'go all the way' when you lose?
Wait, I know this is strip poker, but... is this one of those ones where you have to 'go all the way' when you lose?
I should've prepared myself mentally for this... I've never done anything this perverted {small}with others around{!reset}. But I'll keep playing, f-for Team Magma!

(Man, I could really go for a snack right now.)

I suppose this will even things out a bit.
Darn, I didn't keep my lead.
Ah, darn, it's me now? I was doing so well.

I guess my winning streak is at an end. For Team Magma...

it's my turn? Dang, now I have to give that up...

This isn't about Team Magma any more -- you guys are bullying me!
I knew that wouldn't work. Guess I'll need to say goodbye to my socks then.
Another loss? Not a good start, I'll admit...
My turn again?

state.text: My pride as a Team Magma grunt is vanishing down to nothing...

case.state: Alright, I won a round! ... eh? Oh come on!
Team Magma will have its revenge! ... Right after this round.

I'll just start with my gloves... (Don't make eye contact with Cynthia! She'll see your fear!)
I don't have to start big, right? I'll just slip off my gloves, then.
I have a brilliant and original plan - taking off my gloves first!
Guess the next step is to get rid of my shoes. They just slip right off!
I guess the next thing is to slip off my shoes. Nothin' to it, they don't even have laces.
Before you ask, no, this isn't official Team Magma underwear. I just like to dress to match, okay?
Before you even ask, no, these aren't part of the uniform. I just like to dress to match, okay?
My official Team Magma hoodie... it's a shame, but I can survive without it!
The official hoodie of a Team Magma member... they made a lot of them in my size. I'll be fine without it.
I love proudly wearing the hoodie of Team Magma ... but not so much when we worked inside Mt. Chimney. That was a scorcher.
When I was a kid, my socks got torn up by a wild Poochyena. Got made fun of for it at school.
Gotta be careful going through the tall grass - a lotta wild Pokémon like to nip at your legs, and that means your socks get scuffed.
Down go my Team Magma shorts... the most comfortable part of the kit!
The shorts are the most comfortable part of my kit... ah well.
These shorts are so comfy, breezy, easy to wear... I could go on, but I won't.
Well, if I have to... I'll get rid of my shirt. It's the only thing I can do. Sigh.
I guess there's nothin' else for it... the shirt has to go. Sigh.
I guess if I've got nothin' else left, there's nothin' for it...
I haven't got any other choice, so I may as well...
So, there... I'm playing fairly, see? Nothing to worry about! (I think she bought it!)
I can't even try to look composed with ~leech~ looking at me! I'll just turn away for now!
~Leech~ used Leer. Magma Grunt's Defense fell!
I'm... tryin' something a little different down there. Don't judge me! In fact, just look away!
I was tryin' a little bit of style down there... Don't stare at it! In fact, just look away!
I wasn't actually expectin' to have to show off to anyone... I'm tryin' something new! Don't judge me!

I've heard that lame excuse of a joke so many times from guys. Ugh.
Guys always try to approach me with that same joke, "Oh durr do your undies match your hood?" What Taillow brains...
T-there, happy? You got to see my bra! Congratulations!
F-fine! There, you got to see my bra! Happy now?
You haven't seen anythin' yet. I'm gonna win this stupid game!
Don't lose those! The pouch has my wallet in it -- and I counted my spare change before the game!
Put those somewhere safe! The pouch has my wallet in it - and I counted my Pokédollars before I came here!

It'll be your turn, next! Don't underestimate me!
